description: Gap: Baseline scenario with a medium to high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway with SSP3 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 7.0 W/m2 in 2100.  Concentration-driven.
keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP3, RCP7.0, future, Medium-high forcing, Gap: Baseline
long_name: gap-filling scenario reaching 7.0 based on SSP3
rationale: The scenario represents the medium to high end of plausible future pathways. SSP3-7.0 fills a gap in the CMIP5 forcing pathways that is particularly important because it represents a forcing level common to several (unmitigated) SSP baselines.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0
requirements.label: RCP70Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: An ensemble of nine members (if not 9, then as many as possible).
requirements.label: NineMember

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
